item.title: Featured Articles
item.description: Let us know if you have published using ChIPseeker and your publication will be featured here. 2018 Nervous System Regionalization Entails Axial Allocation before Neural Differentiation. Cell. 2018. The DNA binding landscape of the maize AUXIN RESPONSE FACTOR family. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:4526. PWWP2A binds distinct chromatin moieties and interacts with an MTA1-specific core NuRD complex. Nature Communications. 2018, 9:4300. MYC Interacts with the G9a Histone Methyltransferase to Drive Transcriptional Repression and Tumorigenesis.
